title: Lee Sin players are bad people
body:
I hate all of you. If one more Lee Sin random key mashes into a killing spree in my game and then says "ez" or "outplayed" I'm going to devote my life to hunting them down and kicking them in the balls.

There is nothing fun about this champ. Fuck Lee Sin players. Fuck Lee Sin. Fuck whoever designed Lee Sin and fuck Riot for refusing to do anything about Lee for 5+ years.

replies.body: So me playing lee sin a lot and encouraging my team mates even in the events of a near loss and even going as far as to not partake in all chat makes me a bad person?...Alright sounds about right, Now give me a moment as I give my best friend a valentines cookie.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkmind1212,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZUPcEJnp,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-15T03:06:08.097+0000)
>
> So me playing lee sin a lot and encouraging my team mates even in the events of a near loss and even going as far as to not partake in all chat makes me a bad person?...Alright sounds about right, Now give me a moment as I give my best friend a valentines cookie.

Playing Lee Sin makes you a dick. I don't care what else you do.

> [{quoted}](name=ComeOnAndSlamJam,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZUPcEJnp,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-15T04:24:58.596+0000)
>
> Playing Lee Sin makes you a dick. I don't care what else you do.

I prefer the term 'Ass hole' Thank you very much ^w^
Lee Sin champ design is fine. His stupid high numbers on everything isn't.
You still play without muting everyone at the start?
Did you ever think maybe its just because you suck?

> [{quoted}](name=causeimdabatman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZUPcEJnp,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-15T04:33:29.771+0000)
>
> Did you ever think maybe its just because you suck?

Lee Sin playing fuckhead detected.

> [{quoted}](name=ComeOnAndSlamJam,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZUPcEJnp,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-02-15T05:12:11.217+0000)
>
> Lee Sin playing fuckhead detected.

lul i don't even play lee
I really wonder why people are so shameless when it comes to playing assholes like lee and zed.

git gud skrubl0rd kazual

can't even fite lee

> [{quoted}](name=MissyPinkyKitteh,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZUPcEJnp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-15T01:00:58.751+0000)

Fuck you.
